title: Hour 2: Russ is Back
description:
Freddie Coleman and Courtney Cronin react to Russell Westbrook exercising $47.1 million option with the Lakers. The crew discusses how many Eastern Conference teams do they trust more than the Nets. Sam Acho joins the show to talk about who the best wide receiver in the NFL is right now. Freddie and Courtney debate if Bradley Beal, Zach LaVine, or James Harden is most deserving of a max contract. Stick around to hear Stephen A's reaction to Kyrie Irving opting in to his contract with the Nets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Russell Westbrook will exercise $47.1 million option with the Lakers.
